header.title: ERTS Reference Manual

description.p: The Erlang Runtime System Application ERTS.

note.p: By default, the erts is only guaranteed to be compatible with other Erlang/OTP components from the same release as the erts itself. See the documentation of the system flag +R on how to communicate with Erlang/OTP components from earlier releases.
